name: WP Related Post
author: Pantho Bihosh

sections.description:
to Buy Premium Plugin Click Here

This is a nice plugin but very simple. No need extra settings. Its plugin & play. That means, just install & active the plugin. Its working automatically. May be you will get huge related plugins for related news, post etc. But all are very complex. If you are annoyed or feel disgusting with there huge options? So you can use this related plugin.

WP Rleated Post is a very simple plugin but strongly customized for your blog or News website. No need extra setup. After activate the plugin is working automatically.

Plugin Demo

  • Click here to see demo: http://www.bihosh.com/2013/09/299.php
sections.installation:
From WordPress Plugin Directory

  • Search ‘WP Related Post’ to Plugins library
  • Install the plugin by click the Install option
  • Activate the plugin

From Your Computer

  • Download the ‘wp-related-post.zip’ file from WordPress plugins directory
  • Upload to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  • Unzip the plugin folder
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard

by FTP

  • Download the plugin from WordPress Plugins directory
  • Unzip the zip folder
  • Upload all folders & files to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  • Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
Q. How Can I Setup the Plugin?

A. No need to extra setup. Its working automatically.
